name: @genese/complexity
description: Analyzes cyclomatic and cognitive complexity of source code. Part of @genese framework.

scripts.build: tsc && cp -r src/json-ast-to-reports/templates dist/src/json-ast-to-reports/templates && cp -r src/automatic-refactoring/templates dist/src/automatic-refactoring/templates && cp -r src/core/chartjs dist/src/core/chartjs
scripts.republish_package: npm run build && npm unpublish -f && npm publish
